procedures.name: Venipuncture
procedures.label: Blood Draw
procedures.description: Collection of venous blood samples for pharmacokinetic (PK), pharmacodynamic (PD), clinical laboratory tests (hematology, chemistry, serology), HbA1c, and pregnancy tests.

code.decode: Collection of venous blood by venipuncture

procedures.name: Urine Sample Collection
procedures.label: Urine Collection
procedures.description: Collection of urine samples for urinalysis, urine pregnancy test, and urine drug screen.

procedures.name: Genetic Sample Collection
procedures.label: Genetic Sample
procedures.description: Collection of a single sample for pharmacogenetic analysis.

procedures.name: Insulin Infusion
procedures.label: Insulin-induced Hypoglycemia
procedures.description: Intravenous (IV) insulin infusion to induce a controlled state of hypoglycemia.

procedures.name: Nasal Drug Administration
procedures.label: Nasal Glucagon Administration
procedures.description: Administration of LY900018 glucagon powder through a nasal dosing device.

procedures.name: Vital Signs Measurement
procedures.label: Vital Signs
procedures.description: Measurement of supine blood pressure, pulse rate, and body temperature at specified time points.

procedures.name: Electrocardiogram
procedures.label: ECG
procedures.description: Recording of single and triplicate 12-lead electrocardiograms (ECGs).

procedures.name: Bedside Plasma Glucose Monitoring
procedures.label: Bedside PG Monitoring
procedures.description: Frequent monitoring of plasma glucose (PG) levels using a bedside device for safety during hypoglycemia induction and post-treatment.

procedures.name: Physical Examination
procedures.label: Physical Exam
procedures.description: A medical physical examination performed at screening.

procedures.name: Anthropometric Measurement
procedures.label: Height and Weight Measurement
procedures.description: Measurement of patient's height at screening and weight at specified visits.

procedures.name: Injection-Site Assessment
procedures.label: Injection-Site Assessment
procedures.description: Assessment of the injection site for patients receiving intramuscular glucagon (IMG).

procedures.name: Nasal Inspection
procedures.label: Nasal Inspection
procedures.description: Inspection of the nasal passages before and after study treatment administration.

procedures.name: Hypoglycemia Symptoms Assessment
procedures.label: Edinburgh Hypoglycemia Scale
procedures.description: Assessment of clinical symptoms of hypoglycemia using the Edinburgh Hypoglycemia Scale questionnaire.

medicalDevices.name: Nasal Dosing Device
medicalDevices.label: LY900018 Device
medicalDevices.description: A user-friendly, single-use, nasal dosing device that delivers 3 mg glucagon powder (LY900018) for absorption through the nasal mucosa.

medicalDevices.name: Intramuscular Injection Kit
medicalDevices.label: GlucaGen Kit
medicalDevices.description: Kit for reconstitution and intramuscular injection of 1 mg glucagon, implying a syringe and needle. The comparator product is GlucaGen.

medicalDevices.name: Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.label: IV Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.description: Device used for the intravenous (IV) infusion of insulin to induce hypoglycemia.

medicalDevices.name: Bedside Glucose Monitor
medicalDevices.label: Bedside PG Monitor
medicalDevices.description: Point-of-care device for frequent monitoring of plasma glucose (PG) levels.

medicalDevices.name: 12-lead ECG Machine
medicalDevices.label: ECG Machine
medicalDevices.description: Device for recording 12-lead electrocardiograms for safety monitoring.

medicalDevices.name: Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion Pump
medicalDevices.label: CSII Pump
medicalDevices.description: An insulin pump used by some patients as part of their standard daily insulin therapy.
